comment_4: This song is very inspiring for me because this song makes me really rise . Well this song makes me to keep the spirit to keep rising in a state of distress or bad and makes me confident to continue to try and face all obstacles in life
comment_5: This song really have a great meaning.The writer of this song want to tell us that in the past he feel that he can't do anything to fix his live,that his only friend is just pain.But at one time he have found a spirit to make his live become better.He feels that he can break the chains that bind him and he know that he can make it and his new life has just begin.
